summary: This is an email from the AT&T Court Appearance Team to an unspecified recipient regarding an upcoming witness appearance in the case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The email offers to schedule a preparation call with a witness located in Suffern, NY, prior to their court appearance.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the defendant in the criminal case referenced in the email subject line (USA V GHISLAINE MAXWELL 20 CR 330 (AJN)).

events.title: Email regarding witness preparation
events.description: The AT&T Court Appearance Team sends an email offering to schedule a preparation call with a witness for an upcoming appearance in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

locations: 11760 US HWY 1, Suite 300, North Palm Beach FL 33408
keyFacts: The communication is related to the criminal case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 CR 330 (AJN)).
A witness for the case is located in Suffern, New York.
The email is from the AT&T Court Appearance Team, part of the JEF Finance - Global Legal Demand Center, offering logistical support for witness preparation.
The document is an external email, indicating coordination between a corporate legal support service and parties involved in the trial.
The witness's name is not disclosed in the provided text.
